dynaForm.sql: (SELECT CONCAT(C.CON_VALUE, ' (@#GROUP)') AS LABEL, '@#OF_TO_ASSIGN' AS OF_TO_ASSIGN, '@#CONFIRM' AS CONFIRM, TU.TAS_UID AS TAS_UID, TU.USR_UID AS USR_UID, TU.TU_TYPE AS TU_TYPE, TU.TU_RELATION AS TU_RELATION FROM TASK_USER AS TU LEFT JOIN GROUPWF AS G ON (TU.USR_UID = G.GRP_UID) LEFT JOIN CONTENT AS C ON (G.GRP_UID = C.CON_ID AND C.CON_CATEGORY = 'GRP_TITLE' AND C.CON_LANG = '@#LANG') WHERE TU_TYPE = @#TYPE AND TU_RELATION = 2 AND TU.TAS_UID = '@#TASK') UNION (SELECT CONCAT(U.USR_FIRSTNAME, ' ', U.USR_LASTNAME) AS LABEL, '@#OF_TO_ASSIGN' AS OF_TO_ASSIGN, '@#CONFIRM' AS CONFIRM, TU.TAS_UID AS TAS_UID, TU.USR_UID AS USR_UID, TU.TU_TYPE AS TU_TYPE, TU.TU_RELATION AS TU_RELATION FROM TASK_USER AS TU LEFT JOIN USERS AS U ON (TU.USR_UID = U.USR_UID) WHERE TU_TYPE = @#TYPE AND TU_RELATION = 1 AND TU.TAS_UID = '@#TASK' AND TU.USR_UID NOT IN (@#UIDS))
